members.name: EntityDispatcherBase

docs.summary: Constructs a new instance of the `EntityDispatcherBase` class

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to save a new entity to remote storage.
 *
 * @param entity - entity to add, which may omit its key if pessimistic and the server creates the key; must have a key if optimistic save.
 *
 * @returns A terminating Observable of the entity after server reports successful save or the save error.
 */
members.name: add

docs.summary: Dispatch action to save a new entity to remote storage.
docs.returns: A terminating Observable of the entity after server reports successful save or the save error.

params.name: entity
params.description: entity to add, which may omit its key if pessimistic and the server creates the key; must have a key if optimistic save.

members.name: addAllToCache

docs.summary: Replace all entities in the cached collection. Does not save to remote storage.

members.name: addManyToCache

docs.summary: Add multiple new entities directly to the cache. Does not save to remote storage. Entities with primary keys already in cache are ignored.

members.name: addOneToCache

docs.summary: Add a new entity directly to the cache. Does not save to remote storage. Ignored if an entity with the same primary key is already in cache.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to cancel the persistence operation (query or save). Will cause save observable to error with a PersistenceCancel error. Caller is responsible for undoing changes in cache from pending optimistic save
 *
 * @param correlationId - The correlation id for the corresponding EntityAction
 *
 * @param reason - explains why canceled and by whom.
 */
members.name: cancel

docs.summary: Dispatch action to cancel the persistence operation (query or save). Will cause save observable to error with a PersistenceCancel error. Caller is responsible for undoing changes in cache from pending optimistic save

params.name: correlationId
params.description: The correlation id for the corresponding EntityAction

params.name: reason
params.description: explains why canceled and by whom.

members.name: clearCache

docs.summary: Clear the cached entity collection

members.docComment:
/**
 * Create an {EntityAction} for this entity type and dispatch it immediately to the store.
 *
 * @param op - the entity operation
 *
 * @param data - the action data
 *
 * @param options - additional options
 *
 * @returns the dispatched EntityAction
 */
members.name: createAndDispatch

docs.summary: Create an {EntityAction} for this entity type and dispatch it immediately to the store.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Create an {EntityAction} for this entity type.
 *
 * @param entityOp - the entity operation
 *
 * @param data - the action data
 *
 * @param options - additional options
 *
 * @returns the EntityAction
 */
members.name: createEntityAction

docs.summary: Create an {EntityAction} for this entity type.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to delete entity from remote storage by key.
 *
 * @param key - The primary key of the entity to remove
 *
 * @returns A terminating Observable of the deleted key after server reports successful save or the save error.
 */
members.name: delete

docs.summary: Dispatch action to delete entity from remote storage by key.
docs.returns: A terminating Observable of the deleted key after server reports successful save or the save error.

params.name: key
params.description: The primary key of the entity to remove

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to delete entity from remote storage by key.
 *
 * @param key - The entity to delete
 *
 * @returns A terminating Observable of the deleted key after server reports successful save or the save error.
 */
members.name: delete

docs.summary: Dispatch action to delete entity from remote storage by key.
docs.returns: A terminating Observable of the deleted key after server reports successful save or the save error.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch an Action to the store.
 *
 * @param action - the Action
 *
 * @returns the dispatched Action
 */
members.name: dispatch

docs.summary: Dispatch an Action to the store.

members.name: entityActionFactory

docs.summary: Creates an {EntityAction}

members.name: entityName

docs.summary: Name of the entity type for which entities are dispatched

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to query remote storage for all entities and merge the queried entities into the cached collection.
 *
 * @returns A terminating Observable of the queried entities that are in the collection after server reports success query or the query error.
 *
 * @see
 *
 * load()
 */
members.name: getAll

docs.summary: Dispatch action to query remote storage for all entities and merge the queried entities into the cached collection.
docs.returns: A terminating Observable of the queried entities that are in the collection after server reports success query or the query error.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entity with this primary key. If the server returns an entity, merge it into the cached collection.
 *
 * @returns A terminating Observable of the collection after server reports successful query or the query error.
 */
members.name: getByKey

docs.summary: Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entity with this primary key. If the server returns an entity, merge it into the cached collection.
docs.returns: A terminating Observable of the collection after server reports successful query or the query error.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entities that satisfy a query expressed with either a query parameter map or an HTTP URL query string, and merge the results into the cached collection.
 *
 * @param queryParams - the query in a form understood by the server
 *
 * @returns A terminating Observable of the queried entities after server reports successful query or the query error.
 */
members.name: getWithQuery

docs.summary: Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entities that satisfy a query expressed with either a query parameter map or an HTTP URL query string, and merge the results into the cached collection.
docs.returns: A terminating Observable of the queried entities after server reports successful query or the query error.

params.name: queryParams
params.description: the query in a form understood by the server

members.name: guard

docs.summary: Utility class with methods to validate EntityAction payloads.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to query remote storage for all entities and completely replace the cached collection with the queried entities.
 *
 * @returns A terminating Observable of the entities in the collection after server reports successful query or the query error.
 *
 * @see
 *
 * getAll
 */
members.name: load

docs.summary: Dispatch action to query remote storage for all entities and completely replace the cached collection with the queried entities.
docs.returns: A terminating Observable of the entities in the collection after server reports successful query or the query error.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entities that satisfy a query expressed with either a query parameter map or an HTTP URL query string, and completely replace the cached collection with the queried entities.
 *
 * @param queryParams - the query in a form understood by the server
 *
 * @param options - options that influence load behavior
 *
 * @returns A terminating Observable of the queried entities after server reports successful query or the query error.
 */
members.name: loadWithQuery

docs.summary: Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entities that satisfy a query expressed with either a query parameter map or an HTTP URL query string, and completely replace the cached collection with the queried entities.
docs.returns: A terminating Observable of the queried entities after server reports successful query or the query error.

params.name: queryParams
params.description: the query in a form understood by the server

members.docComment:
/**
 * Remove multiple entities directly from the cache. Does not delete these entities from remote storage.
 *
 * @param entity - The entities to remove
 */
members.name: removeManyFromCache

docs.summary: Remove multiple entities directly from the cache. Does not delete these entities from remote storage.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Remove multiple entities directly from the cache. Does not delete these entities from remote storage.
 *
 * @param keys - The primary keys of the entities to remove
 */
members.name: removeManyFromCache

docs.summary: Remove multiple entities directly from the cache. Does not delete these entities from remote storage.

params.name: keys
params.description: The primary keys of the entities to remove

members.docComment:
/**
 * Remove an entity directly from the cache. Does not delete that entity from remote storage.
 *
 * @param entity - The entity to remove
 */
members.name: removeOneFromCache

docs.summary: Remove an entity directly from the cache. Does not delete that entity from remote storage.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Remove an entity directly from the cache. Does not delete that entity from remote storage.
 *
 * @param key - The primary key of the entity to remove
 */
members.name: removeOneFromCache

docs.summary: Remove an entity directly from the cache. Does not delete that entity from remote storage.

params.name: key
params.description: The primary key of the entity to remove

members.name: selectId

docs.summary: Returns the primary key (id) of this entity

members.name: setFilter

docs.summary: Set the pattern that the collection's filter applies when using the `filteredEntities` selector.

members.name: setLoaded

docs.summary: Set the loaded flag

members.name: setLoading

docs.summary: Set the loading flag

members.name: store

docs.summary: The store, scoped to the EntityCache

members.name: toUpdate

docs.summary: Convert an entity (or partial entity) into the `Update<T>` object `update...` and `upsert...` methods take `Update<T>` args

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to save the updated entity (or partial entity) in remote storage. The update entity may be partial (but must have its key) in which case it patches the existing entity.
 *
 * @param entity - update entity, which might be a partial of T but must at least have its key.
 *
 * @returns A terminating Observable of the updated entity after server reports successful save or the save error.
 */
members.name: update

docs.summary: Dispatch action to save the updated entity (or partial entity) in remote storage. The update entity may be partial (but must have its key) in which case it patches the existing entity.
docs.returns: A terminating Observable of the updated entity after server reports successful save or the save error.

params.name: entity
params.description: update entity, which might be a partial of T but must at least have its key.

members.name: updateManyInCache

docs.summary: Update multiple cached entities directly. Does not update these entities in remote storage. Entities whose primary keys are not in cache are ignored. Update entities may be partial but must at least have their keys. such partial entities patch their cached counterparts.

members.name: updateOneInCache

docs.summary: Update a cached entity directly. Does not update that entity in remote storage. Ignored if an entity with matching primary key is not in cache. The update entity may be partial (but must have its key) in which case it patches the existing entity.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to save a new or existing entity to remote storage. Only dispatch this action if your server supports upsert.
 *
 * @param entity - entity to add, which may omit its key if pessimistic and the server creates the key; must have a key if optimistic save.
 *
 * @returns A terminating Observable of the entity after server reports successful save or the save error.
 */
members.name: upsert

docs.summary: Dispatch action to save a new or existing entity to remote storage. Only dispatch this action if your server supports upsert.
docs.returns: A terminating Observable of the entity after server reports successful save or the save error.

params.name: entity
params.description: entity to add, which may omit its key if pessimistic and the server creates the key; must have a key if optimistic save.

members.name: upsertManyInCache

docs.summary: Add or update multiple cached entities directly. Does not save to remote storage.

members.name: upsertOneInCache

docs.summary: Add or update a new entity directly to the cache. Does not save to remote storage. Upsert entity might be a partial of T but must at least have its key. Pass the Update<T> structure as the payload
Dispatches EntityCollection actions to their reducers and effects (default implementation). All save commands rely on an Ngrx Effect such as `EntityEffects.persist$`.
